name: The Hermit
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
A game for deft, fast and strong in spirit. An interesting and addictive gameplay. The exciting atmosphere of dark corridors teeming with bloodthirsty zombies ... A simulator of survival in the midst of a zombie apocalypse.

In the story you - Special Forces Corporation ATTA. During the failed tests, the "S" virus leaked, which turned most of the employees into the walking dead. The virus has infected you, gradually killing the living tissues of your body.

There must be medicine at the lower levels of the underground laboratory. Hurry up to find an antidote and save the world from a global catastrophe. Every wrong step, like every wasted second, will inevitably lead to death. You are the last hope of mankind. The countdown has begun ...

- nice graphics
- simple operation
- interesting gameplay
- find dark secrets lurking in human souls
- unforgettable adventures
- light music dark ambient
- terrific horror
